page.title: 05PARKGATE SCHOOL PARADE 1985
page.content: On{Saturday}15th{June}1985 Parkgate County Primary School had their{annual {Summer Fayre.}Every year they have a {theme}so that the children can dress up and go in the{parade. This year the theme was{"Out of this {World"}and Mr Cairns (a parent) dressed up as{Darth Vader}and led the parade.{Children}were{dressed up}as robots, aliens, space rockets, daleks, astronauts, ghost busters, superman and wonder-woman. In addition there was a{band}and two{floats.}Both floats carried some of the children. At{half past one}the parade left {Parksfield,}went down Station Road, along the Parade to Mostyn Square, up Brookland Road to the school where it paraded round the{school field.}Next Darth Vader came round the competitors and chose the best costumes. Then at {half past two}the Fayre was{opened.
